revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=BEFSR41 |revision=v1 |asin= |est_release_date=05/2000 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=router |fcc_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=dunno |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C4510;ARM, SAMSUNG 023, S3C4510X01-QER0; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=512 KiB |fla1_brand=Bright |fla1_model=BM29F040-90AC |ram1=1 MiB |ram1_brand=tmTECH |ram1_model=T224162B-26I |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8019AS |eth_chip3_brand=Altima |eth_chip3_model=AC104;ALTIMA, 0019T0, AC104-QF, CC509802B3; |sw_brand=ADMtek |sw_model=Olive (LES105);ADMtek, OLIVE, LES105, 0027AAABR1904610.01; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=CMOS SRAM (16Mb);EtronTech;EM636327Q-8;;1; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:06:25 }} {{TagLine|Instant Broadband Series EtherFast Cable/DSL Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=BEFSR41}}
"P/N:F5-610007-43 REV:", "MADE IN TAIWAN R.O.C", and "1284022C" :is silkscreened on the mainboard of the noted unit. A date code of '''0021''' is etched onto the bottom.
:"A/N:"<......>"S5-PA5", "P/N:"<....>"Rev. PA", and "START: 2000/5/3" :is silkscreened on the switch board.
The device populating this entry is presumed to be a v1 :- it has no revision information on its label. :.. however, [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=3870 it would appear there would] be some :differences between v1 units ([[Altima]] vs AMD PHYs) :This is presumably a later revision v1.
This device has a seperate board for the S3C4510 router :portion and the FE switch.
The switch board is certainly manufactured by '''Runtop''' :(a label to the board seems to indicate it is model ARS5 - :a '''Runtop''' label w/ ARS5 printed on it is also affixed :to the casing [along with another of a different style..) The router board may also be (or instead, ''[[BroMax]]'' / ''[[CyberTAN]]''??)
===Wikis=== *{{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_BEFSR41_1.0}} *[https://www.randomprojects.org/wiki/Linksys_BEFVP41 ''Linksys BEFVP41'' on '''RandomProjects''' wiki]
===Other=== *[http://jlc.iwarp.com/boxes.html ''Router Boxes being Analyzed'' on '''jlc.iwarp.com'''] :It looks to be more or less the same as the unit shown here.
===See also=== *[[Linksys BEFVP41]] - [https://www.randomprojects.org/wiki/Linksys_BEFVP41 Linksys BEFVP41]
